name: use-battery-status
description: A React hook to access system battery information via the Battery Status API
title: guara hooks

properties.name: supported
properties.description: Whether the Battery Status API is supported

properties.name: charging
properties.description: Whether the battery is currently charging

properties.name: chargingTime
properties.description: Time in seconds until the battery is fully charged

properties.name: dischargingTime
properties.description: Time in seconds until the battery is fully discharged

properties.name: The
properties.description: hook returns an object with the following properties

bullets: Real-time battery information with automatic updates via the Battery Status API events.
Graceful fallback when the API is not supported.
Simple and declarative interface for easy integration.
